about_the_game:
Escape game from a classic mansion

[game description]

The main character, a reporter, visits an old mansion, commonly known as the Old Rose Mansion, to investigate an incident that occurred there, but while investigating the surrounding area, he is attacked by someone and loses consciousness.

When he comes to, he finds himself inside the mansion.

He searches for a way to escape from the mansion while investigating what once happened in this mansion.

There are hints scattered in notes, objects, and various other places around the house, and the player solves the riddle based on these clues.

By solving the riddles, you will get keys, hints, etc., and eventually find out who is the culprit.

The game is a riddle, puzzle, deduction, exploration, and horror game.

[Game System]

Explore the museum from a first-person viewpoint (FPV), examine objects, obtain items, and gather information via notes.

There is a search assist function that, when turned on, will illuminate hidden rooms and items.

By collecting more information and hidden rooms, you will earn more points and be rated as a reporter when you escape.

Please aim to be a great detective.

[About the distribution]

Distribution is possible.

The music played from the gramophone is royalty-free, but some distribution sites may infringe on copyrights.

The volume of the gramophone can be adjusted in the settings, so we recommend that you play without the gramophone volume.
